titleStmt.title: An account of what duties were payable by the Act of tonnage and poundage at the settling of the book, of rates anno 1660, upon one hundred reams of the several sorts of paper hereafter specified also what is now paid upon entry of the like quantity : with what will be payable for the same if the further duties proposed on paper should be enacted, viz.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the California State Library, Sutro branch.
